## Input.setAlign() method

Change the alignment of the connection's field(s).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAlign(align: number): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  align | number | One of the values of Align In RTL mode directions are reversed, and Align.RIGHT aligns to the left. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Input](./blockly.input.md)
